name: Daddy-Dino (RaniOfTheRain, Mikymac, Yetibytes, DexyChicken, MichaelChristie, CyanidePanda)
name_original: Daddy-Dino (RaniOfTheRain, Mikymac, Yetibytes, DexyChicken, MichaelChristie, CyanidePanda)
description: Take the time to revisit your childhood in this game of snow-filled wonder and battle; fight with your friends to defeat Dino-Dad before mum calls you in for dinner using a range of weapons from swords to snowballs. Watch out though, Daddy-Dino may have some tricks up his sleeve to surprise you.
